product_desc: Nuxt is a progressive framework based on Vue.js to create modern web applications. It is based on Vue.js official libraries (vue, vue-router and vuex) and powerful development tools (webpack, Babel and PostCSS). Nuxt's goal is to make web development powerful and performant with a great developer experience in mind.

Nuxt's goal is to make web development powerful and performant with a great developer experience in mind.
